t1.PIMPERSONID2, t1.PIMPERSONID3, t1.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PIMPERSONNAME2, t1.PIMPERSONNAME3, t1.PORTALUSERID, t1.POSTALADDRESS, t1.POSTEXPIRATION, t1.RANK, t1.RANKRQ, t1.RCXLLX, t1.RDSJ, t1.RETIPLACE, t1.RTSJ, t1.RZDQ, t1.RZNLDQ, t1.RZNLDQ_COLOR, t1.RZNX, t1.RZQD, t1.RZSJ, t1.SFDSZN, t1.SFNBFP, t1.SFTBERP, t1.SFZ, floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t1.CSRQ) / 12) AS SFZNL, t1.SGJSRQ, t1.SGKSRQ, t1.SGYY, t1.SJTXRQ, t1.SPDYLJE, t1.SUPERUSER, t1.SYCZJRQ, t1.SYDQ, t1.SYQDQSJ, t1.TOZJDATE, t1.TRANSFERDATE, t1.TXDQ, case when t1.SJTXRQ is null then null when months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))<=0 THEN TO_CHAR(floor(months_between(NVL( t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE),SYSDATE) )) else 'N/A' end AS TXNX, case when (months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))>-7 and months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))<=-1 ) then '30'when months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))>-1 then '20' else '10' end AS TXNX_COLOR, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WORKSTATE, c2.PIMTITLECATALOGUEID where c1.PIMPERSONID= t1.PIMPERSONID ) AS ZYJSZW, t1.ZYZG, t11.ZZDZS, t1.ZZMM FROM T_PIMPERSON t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t21 ON t1.PIMCITYID = t51.PIMCITYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( ( t1.YGZT = '50' OR t1.YGZT = '51' OR ( t1.YGZT = '70' AND ( t1.SFNBFP = 1 OR t1.SFNBFP IS NULL ) ) ) AND ( t1.JLSS = '10' OR t1.JLSS IS NULL ) )

select agetype,count(1) as countnum from ( select case when age<=30 then '30' when age>=31 and age<=35 then '31' when age>=36 and age<=40 then '36' when age>=41 and age<=45 then '41' when age>=46 and age<=50 then '46' when age>=51 and age<=55 then '51' else '55' end agetype from ( select floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t1.CSRQ)/12) AS age from t_pimperson t1 where YGZT not in ('40','50','60','130','51') and jlss='10' and enable=1 ) ) group by agetype
select ormtype,count(1) as countnum from BIS_EMPLOYEEANALYSIS_T group by ormtype

orgid from t_srforg a where substr(a.orgcode,1,3) in ('181','182','183')) ) ) )

,SYSDATE))<=0 THEN TO_CHAR(floor(months_between(NVL( t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE),SYSDATE) )) else 'N/A' end AS TXNX, case when (months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))>-7 and months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))<=-1 ) then '30'when months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))>-1 then '20' else '10' end AS TXNX_COLOR, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WORKSTATE, t1.XB, t1.XTBH, t1.XX, t1.YDZT, t1.YGBH, t1.YGBHQYSJ, t1.YGLX, t1.YGZT, t1.YJSNF, t1.YYGBH, case when t1.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t1.ZGZT, t1.ZJ, t1.ZJHM, t1.ZJLX, t1.ZJNX, t1.ZP, t1.ZT, t1.ZW, t1.ZWNX, t1.ZWRQ, ( select wm_concat(c2.PIMTITLECATALOGUENAME) from T_PIMTITLE c1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMTITLECATALOGUE c2 on c1.PIMTITLECATALOGUEID = c2.PIMTITLECATALOGUEID where c1.PIMPERSONID= t1.PIMPERSONID ) AS ZYJSZW, t1.ZYZG, t11.ZZDZS, t1.ZZMM FROM T_PIMPERSON t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t21 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t21.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMMAJORSETYPE t31 ON t1.PIMMAJORSETYPEID = t31.PIMMAJORSETYPEID LEFT JOIN T_PCMRCXL t41 ON t1.PCMRCXLID = t41.PCMRCXLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMCITY t51 ON t1.PIMCITYID = t51.PIMCITYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.YGZT = '30' AND t1.JLSS = '10' )

SELECT t1.`AHTC`, t1.`BLACKLISTREASONS`, t1.`CERTTIFICATE`, t1.`CFYXJSRQ`, t1.`CJGZSJ`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CSD`, t1.`CSRQ`, t1.`CYM`, t1.`CZ`, t1.`DACJGZSJ`, t1.`DACSRQ`, t1.`DARDSJ`, t1.`DAXL`, t1.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DURATION`, t1.`DYXLBYSJ`, t1.`DYXLBYYX`, t1.`DYXLSSZY`, t1.`DZJBJSJ`, t1.`DZYX`, 'ORACLE->MYSQL' AS `EMPLOYEEANDNO`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`FIRSTEDUCATION`, t1.`GLY`, t1.`GLY2`, t1.`GW`, t1.`GWKSRQ`, t1.`GWZT`, t1.`GZBM`, 0 AS `GZDQ`, 10 AS `GZDQ_COLOR`, t1.`GZJSSJ`, t1.`GZKSSJ`, t1.`GZZT`, t1.`GZZZ`, t1.`HIGHEDUCATION`, t1.`HIGHTITLE`, t1.`HJDZ`, t1.`HJSZD`, t1.`HKLX`, t1.`HMD`, t1.`HQXLBYYX`, t1.`HQXLSXZY`, t1.`HTQDCS`, t1.`HYZK`, t1.`ISLEADERTEAM`, t1.`JG`, t1.`JKZK`, t1.`JLCZZ`, t1.`JLGLBH`, t1.`JLSPZT`, t1.`JLSS`, t1.`JTLXR`, t1.`JTLXRDH`, t1.`JTLXRID`, t1.`JXDQ`, t1.`JXSSXDS`, t1.`JXSYWDS`, t1.`JZRZ`, t1.`KHCJ`, t1.`KHCJTX`, t1.`LEAVEDATE`, t1.`LGKSSJ`, t1.`LGNX`, t1.`LGNX_COLOR`, t1.`LXDH`, t1.`MZ`, 1 AS `NJ`, t1.`NL`, t1.`NUMCODE`, t21.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t21.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PCMJXSYGZZJLMXID`, t1.`PCMRCXLID`, t41.`PCMRCXLNAME`, t1.`PIMCITYID`, t51.`PIMCITYNAME`, t1.`PIMMAJORSETYPEID`, t31.`PIMMAJORSETYPENAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t1.`PIMPERSONID2`, t1.`PIMPERSONID3`, t1.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONNAME2`, t1.`PIMPERSONNAME3`, t1.`PORTALUSERID`, t1.`POSTALADDRESS`, t1.`POSTEXPIRATION`, t1.`RANK`, t1.`RANKRQ`, t1.`RCXLLX`, t1.`RDSJ`, t1.`RETIPLACE`, t1.`RTSJ`, t1.`RZDQ`, t1.`RZNLDQ`, t1.`RZNLDQ_COLOR`, t1.`RZNX`, t1.`RZQD`, t1.`RZSJ`, t1.`SFDSZN`, t1.`SFNBFP`, t1.`SFTBERP`, t1.`SFZ`, 0 AS `SFZNL`, t1.`SGJSRQ`, t1.`SGKSRQ`, t1.`SGYY`, t1.`SJTXRQ`, t1.`SPDYLJE`, t1.`SUPERUSER`, t1.`SYCZJRQ`, t1.`SYDQ`, t1.`SYQDQSJ`, t1.`TOZJDATE`, t1.`TRANSFERDATE`, t1.`TXDQ`, 0 AS `TXNX`, '10' AS `TXNX_COLOR`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WORKSTATE`, t1.`XB`, t1.`XTBH`, t1.`XX`, t1.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGBHQYSJ`, t1.`YGLX`, t1.`YGZT`, t1.`YJSNF`, t1.`YYGBH`, case when t1.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t1.`ZGZT`, t1.`ZJ`, t1.`ZJHM`, t1.`ZJLX`, t1.`ZJNX`, t1.`ZP`, t1.`ZT`, t1.`ZW`, t1.`ZWNX`, t1.`ZWRQ`, ( select (c2.PIMTITLECATALOGUENAME) from T_PIMTITLE c1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMTITLECATALOGUE c2 on c1.PIMTITLECATALOGUEID = c2.PIMTITLECATALOGUEID where c1.PIMPERSONID= t1.`PIMPERSONID` ) AS `ZYJSZW`, t1.`ZYZG`, t11.`ZZDZS`, t1.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMPERSON` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t21 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t21.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMMAJORSETYPE t31 ON t1.PIMMAJORSETYPEID = t31.PIMMAJORSETYPEID LEFT JOIN T_PCMRCXL t41 ON t1.PCMRCXLID = t41.PCMRCXLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMCITY t51 ON t1.PIMCITYID = t51.PIMCITYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`JLSS` = '10' AND case when t1.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end = '10' AND EXISTS (select 1 from T_PIMDISTIRBUTION t2 where t2.PIMPERSONID = t1.PIMPERSONID and t2.FPZT = 'YXFP' AND t2.FPLX = 'ZFP' AND t2.ENABLE = 1) AND t1.`YDZT` IS NULL )

SELECT t1.AHTC, t1.BLACKLISTREASONS, t1.CERTTIFICATE, t1.CFYXJSRQ, t1.CJGZSJ, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CSD, t1.CSRQ, t1.CYM, t1.CZ, t1.DACJGZSJ, t1.DACSRQ, t1.DARDSJ, t1.DAXL, t1.DBDWSJ, t1.GZBM, case when t1.GZJSSJ is null then null else trunc(months_between(NVL( t1.GZJSSJ ,SYSDATE),SYSDATE) ) end AS GZDQ, case when months_between(NVL( t1.GZJSSJ ,SYSDATE),SYSDATE) <=0 then 20 else 10 END AS GZDQ_COLOR, t1.GZJSSJ, t1.GZKSSJ, t1.GZZT, t1.GZZZ, t1.HIGHEDUCATION, t1.HIGHTITLE, t1.HJDZ, t1.HJSZD, t1.HKLX, t1.HMD, t1.HQXLBYYX, t1.HQXLSXZY, t1.HTQDCS, t1.HYZK, t1.ISLEADERTEAM, t1.JG, t1.LXDH, t1.MZ, floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t1.CSRQ) / 12) AS NJ, t1.NL, t1.NUMCODE, t21.ORDERVALUE, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t1.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORGTYPE, t1.ORMORGID, t1.ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t21.SHORTNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.PCMJXSYGZZJLMXID, t1.PCMRCXLID, t41.PCMRCXLNAME, t1.PIMCITYID, t51.PIMCITYNAME, t1.PIMMAJORSETYPEID, t31.PIMMAJORSETYPENAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t1.PIMPERSONID2, t1.PIMPERSONID3, t1.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PIMPERSONNAME2, t1.PIMPERSONNAME3, t1.PORTALUSERID, t1.POSTALADDRESS, t1.POSTEXPIRATION, t1.RANK, t1.RANKRQ, t1.RCXLLX, t1.RDSJ, t1.RETIPLACE, t1.RTSJ, t1.RZDQ, t1.RZNLDQ, t1.RZNLDQ_COLOR, t1.RZNX, t1.RZQD, t1.RZSJ, t1.SFDSZN, t1.SFNBFP, t1.SFTBERP, t1.SFZ, floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t1.CSRQ) / 12) AS SFZNL, t1.SGJSRQ, t1.SGKSRQ, t1.SGYY, t1.SJTXRQ, t1.SPDYLJE, t1.SUPERUSER, t1.SYCZJRQ, t1.SYDQ, t1.SYQDQSJ, t1.TOZJDATE, t1.TRANSFERDATE, t1.TXDQ, case when t1.SJTXRQ is null then null when months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))<=0 THEN TO_CHAR(floor(months_between(NVL( t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE),SYSDATE) )) else 'N/A' end AS TXNX, case when (months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))>-7 and months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))<=-1 ) then '30'when months_between(SYSDATE,NVL(t1.SJTXRQ ,SYSDATE))>-1 then '20' else '10' end AS TXNX_COLOR, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WORKSTATE, t1.XB, t1.XTBH, t1.XX, t1.YDZT, t1.YGBH, t1.YGBHQYSJ, t1.YGLX, t1.YGZT, t1.YJSNF, t1.YYGBH, case when t1.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t1.ZGZT, t1.ZJ, t1.ZJHM, t1.ZJLX, t1.ZJNX, t1.ZP, t1.ZT, t1.ZW, t1.ZWNX, t1.ZWRQ, ( select wm_concat(c2.PIMTITLECATALOGUENAME) from T_PIMTITLE c1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMTITLECATALOGUE c2 on c1.PIMTITLECATALOGUEID = c2.PIMTITLECATALOGUEID where c1.PIMPERSONID= t1.PIMPERSONID ) AS ZYJSZW, t1.ZYZG, t11.ZZDZS, t1.ZZMM FROM T_PIMPERSON t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t21 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t21.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMMAJORSETYPE t31 ON t1.PIMMAJORSETYPEID = t31.PIMMAJORSETYPEID LEFT JOIN T_PCMRCXL t41 ON t1.PCMRCXLID = t41.PCMRCXLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMCITY t51 ON t1.PIMCITYID = t51.PIMCITYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.JLSS = '10' AND case when t1.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end = '10' AND EXISTS (select 1 from T_PIMDISTIRBUTION t2 where t2.PIMPERSONID = t1.PIMPERSONID and t2.FPZT = 'YXFP' AND t2.FPLX = 'ZFP' AND t2.ENABLE = 1) AND t1.YDZT IS NULL )
